觾字的基本解释

觾
yàn
古同“燕”，燕子。

觾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《廣韻》於甸切，去霰，影。］
亦作“觾1”。
(1)鸟纲燕科各种类的通称。体型小，翅膀尖而长，尾巴分叉像剪刀。飞行时捕食昆虫，对农作物有益。属候鸟。常见的有家燕。
(2)白颈鸦。
(3)安宁；安逸。
(4)指安息；闲居。
(5)对环境或事物感到安适满足。参见“燕安”。
(6)接近；亲近。
(7)亵渎；轻慢。
(8)通“宴”。宴饮；宴请。
(9)指宴席；宴会。
(10)指燕礼。
(11)指燕射。
[②]［yān］
［《廣韻》烏前切，平先，影。］
亦作“觾2”。
(1)古国名。（1）周代诸侯国。又称北燕。姬姓，周公奭之后，在今河北省北部和辽宁省西端，建都蓟（今北京城西南隅）。战国时为七雄之一，后为秦所灭。《孟子·梁惠王下》：“齊人伐燕，勝之。”《史记·燕召公世家》：“周武王之滅紂，封召公於北燕。”裴駰集解：“《世本》曰：'居北燕。'宋忠曰：'有南燕，故云北燕。'”（2）周代诸侯国。又称南燕。姞姓，相传为黄帝之后，在今河南省延津县东北部。《左传·隐公五年》：“衛人以燕師伐

觾字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【角字部】　觾； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1145第27
【字彙補】伊甸切。鳥名。【呂覽·本味篇】肉之美者，雋觾之翠。

觾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
觾字的起名意思

暂无。

Arrogant
Basic explanation of words
Arrogant
yàn
Ancient with "Swallows", swallows.
Arrogant
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yàn］
["Guangyun" Yu Dian cut, go to hail, shadow. ]
Also known as "觾1".
(1) A general term for the various species of Birds. It is small in size, with pointed and long wings, and its tail forks like scissors. It feeds on insects while flying, which is good for crops. Is a migratory bird. Barn swallows are common.
(2) White-necked crow.
(3) Tranquility; ease.
(4) Refers to rest; idle dwelling.
(5) Feel comfortable and satisfied with the environment or things. See "Yan'an".
(6) To be close; to be close.
(7) Profanity; contemptuous.
(8) Through "banquet". Feast
(9) Refers to banquet; banquet.
(10) Refers to Yan Li.
(11) Refers to Yan shot.
[②]［yān］
["Guangyun" Wuqianqie, Pingxian, shadow. ]
Also known as "觾2".
(1) Ancient country name. (1) The princes of the Zhou Dynasty. Also known as Beiyan. The surname Ji, after Zhou Gongshi, was built in the northern part of Hebei Province and the western end of Liaoning Province (now the southwest corner of Beijing). During the Warring States Period, he was one of the seven heroes and was later destroyed by Qin. "Mencius·Lianghui King": "Qi people defeated the swallows, and won them." "Historical Records · Yanzhao Gong Family": "Zhou Wuwang killed the king and sealed the public to the North Yan." The book read:'Jibeiyan.' Song Zhong said:'There are southern swallows, so Yunbei swallows.'" (2) Zhou Dynasty vassals. Also known as Nanyan. His surname was said to be the Yellow Emperor in the northeastern part of Yanjin County, Henan Province. "The Five Years of Zuo Zhuan · Yin Gong": "The Guardian Uses Swallows to Fight
Arrogant

【Word Supplement】Eden cut. The name of the bird. 【Lu Lan·Ben Taste Article】The beauty of meat is the green of juicy.
